post.body: Your updates on homeless girl and other recent events in my life all converge. Blog post soon to explain.
I have you down. No need to order; we will send.
Oh, I am so sorry! Praying for you guys.
Some of our best friends recommended that to use a few weeks ago. We haven't watched it yet, but it's on our list!
I s'pose that depends on the complaint. Really? 70? (Wait, we've had a couple of those days in the past 2 wks . . .)
Amen, sister! I talked with someone today who was happy it was above 0 degrees. I felt silly for complaining about 40.
Haven't read those, although have heard of them all. Interested to hear your thoughts on them.
It's not even that earth-shattering! http://tinyurl.com/85kaky
Looking for participating bloggers on upcoming January tours: The Baby Fat Diet (Bearden/Aaron) and Parting the Waters (Damoff). Interested?
Installed Twitterbar based upon @markgoodyear raves.
Mornin' friends. Espresso brewing, email checked and answered, beautiful day outside. What a great start!
Making pizza crust for tonight's dinner.
Feeling good about the massive reorganization/clean-out happening over here!
Nothing like Christmas to inspire me to do a massive clean out and reorganization of the house!
Happy Boxing day!
My daughter announced we have to leave out milk & cookies for Santa, carrots for reindeer and bunnies, & marshmallows for the Michelin Man.
hoping to get most of the Christmas wrapping done tonight . .
What would YOU do? http://tinyurl.com/7nlfbj
Last minute grandparent gift idea? Paint handprints on ornaments. I'll post pictures after Christmas.
Just got off the phone with Larry Julian. What a neat guy!
